title: Pixel 4a(5G) does not recognize my SIM card and only allows emergency calls. What happened?
content: My Pixel 4a(5G) is no longer recognizing my SIM card.  I started receiving the notification "Emergency calls only". Along with a no SIM card detected notification 2 days ago.  I have removed and reinserted my SIM card and rebooted with no luck.  What could be the problem?  The only thing that I have done differently in the last few days was downloading and adding a Google Voice account.
